body.p: The Wine development release 1.5.9 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Support for GPOS font tables in Uniscribe.
Support for XRandr 1.2 and 1.3.
Parser improvements for the HLSL compiler.
More key exchange algorithms supported on Mac OS.
Relay tracing on ARM.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
